summary: A U.S. soldier returning home from war struggles to reconcile his experiences abroad with the life and family he left in Texas.
cast: Ryan O'Nan|America Ferrera|Jason Ritter|Melissa Leo|Wilmer Valderrama|Diego Klattenhoff|Ana Claudia Talancón|Evan Jones|June Diane Raphael|Ethan Suplee|Zion Sandoval|Sasha Spielberg|Benito Martinez|David Smith|Misty Upham|Barry Shabaka Henley|Destiny Alvarez|Ybarra Reyes|Starwind|Kate Schroeder|Fredrick Lopez|Therese Olson|Jenny Gabrielle|Esodie Geiger|Jeremiah Bitsui|Russell Friedenberg|Kiira Arai|Candice Costello|Ty Mitchell|Donovan Thomas|Arron Shiver|Johnnie Hector|Chad Boardsen|Mario Telles
title: The Dry Land
